import React, { Component } from "react" import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Button, Form, Grid, Header, Message, Segment } from "semantic-ui-react" class NewSongForm extends Component { state = { title: '', genre: '', description: '' } handleNewSongChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } render() { console.log(this.state) return (
New Song
) } } export default NewSongForm
